original: Lundh, Lars Bertil Gunnar, redaktionssekreterare, Varberg, f. 15/1/12 i Varberg av Mauritz L. o. Sophie Olsson. G. 37 m. Ruth Zachrisson. Barn : Ingemar f. 39, Thomas 44. — Stud. v. Varbergs realsk. o. Karlshamns latin-gymn. Medarb. i N. H. T. Vestkus-ten 30-34, i Varbergsposten sed. 34, redisekr. där sed. 43.
translated: Lundh, Lars Bertil Gunnar, editorial secretary, Varberg, b. 15/1/12 in Varberg to Mauritz L. and Sophie Olsson. Married in 1937 to Ruth Zachrisson. Children: Ingemar b. 1939, Thomas b. 1944. Studied at Varbergs realskola and Karlshamns latin-gymnasium. Collaborated with N.H.T. Vestkusten from 1930-1934, and with Varbergsposten since 1934. Became a secretary there in 1943.
